snippet: Mukhtar Ablyazov, a Kazakh businessman accused of embezzling $6 billion from BTA, a bank he once controlled, has been arrested near Cannes in southern France, a police official said.
abstract: Mukhtar Ablyazov, Kazakh businessman accused of embezzling $6 billion from BTA, bank he once controlled, is arrested near Cannes in southern France.
lead_paragraph: Mukhtar Ablyazov, a Kazakh businessman accused of embezzling $6 billion from BTA, a bank he once controlled, has been arrested near Cannes in southern France, a police official said.

headline.main: Missing Banker in Kazakhstan Accused of Fraud Is Arrested in Southern France
headline.print_headline: Kazakhstan: Missing Banker Accused Of Fraud Is Arrested in Southern France
